bkgcolor 0.031 0.011 0.188

threadcount 25
// 25 is now roughly ideal for csel-kh1262-13

sphere 3 1.7 1.5 1
sphere 3 1.7 -1.5 1

// after this make yellow cylinders

sphere -8 -10 2.5 1
sphere -8 -10 -2.5 1

cylinder 5.5 0 0 1 -0.1 0 0.5 3

// the ground he's standing on
